name: Dominic Noble
profile:
Hello my beautiful watchers and welcome to my channel!

Ever wondered how loyal a film is to the book it was supposedly based on? Do you like getting your knowledge via a mildly sarcastic British man with expressive eyebrows? This is the youtube channel for you.
I also occasionally review other things too.

You can also find me on:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/The-Dom-1384329085170616/
And Twitter: https://twitter.com/Dominic__Noble

Business email below if you wish to contact me.
